text: I read some reviews about the smoking smell inside this casino, but when I was there, no smoke is allowed inside the room. There is a small cabinet for smoker and now the remain room is fresh.For your information.

Friendly staff to help u chk in and in lobby area. Free shuttle to Seoul Train Stn n Itewon shopping. Free WiFi average quality. 7star Casino in the basement. Afew restaurants oppt the hotel if u wish to go out for meals.
Only for foreigners but everyone speaking only in Korean. Poor quality slots. I never saw any  winner of jackpot. I stayed there 8 nights.
